Q_DESC:
Arnab is a robber and he has managed to rob N different CSTings from Akash. Now he decides to sell these CSTings in the market to make some profit. But, of all the CSTings he has, he wants to find the size of the largest anagram group so that he can easily sell that one first and make maximum profit initially. Help him find the largest size of groups of anagrams.

An anagram of a CSTing is another CSTing that contains same characters, only the order of characters can be different. For example, "abcd" and "dabc" are anagram of each other.

Input:
First line of input contains an integer N, number of total CSTings. Next N lines contains a single ing S.


Constraints: 
1<=N<=100000
1<=|S|<=50


Output:
Print the largest size of group of anagrams possible
